author: beaton
msg: Refactoring OAuthFetcher.  No functional changes, just pulling code out
into separate classes to make later work a little easier.  The goal is
to have OAuthFetcher implement only the control flow of the protocol,
with details left to other classes.

author: assaf
msg: Fixed missing <<, also no longer using default RSpec rcov_opts.

author: stack
msg: Fix help doc continuation of long lines

author: reinhard
msg: enable shortcut for rat plugin (mvn rat:check)

author: reinhard
msg: add and configure the codehaus rat plugin (version, excludes, add it to the 'release' profile)
